143557.「どの装備の どの錬金効果を\n 強化させたいかの？\n<break>:
Which equipment's alchemy effects do you
want to enhance?
<break>

143558.「ほう…… <%sL_MAT_ITEM>を <%dL_NUM>個 使って\n <:
I see... so you want to use <%dL_NUM> <%sL_MAT_ITEM>s
to enhance the <%sL_RENKIN_BEFORE> effect
to <%sL_RENKIN_AFTER>
<yesno 2><break>

143559.「お前の持つ 装備品を\n 救ってやれるのは お前自身だけだ。\n それを 忘れ:
The only person who can save your equipment is
you. Don't forget that.

143560.「なに やめるのか？\n こいつに 期待させておいて……\n お前も 罪な奴だ。:
What, you're quitting? You're guilty of
letting him down, aren't you?

143562.「悪いが この錬金効果は 強化できない。\n 別の効果に してくれ。:
I'm sorry, but this alchemy effect cannot be
enhanced. Please choose a different effect.

143563.「この装備についている 錬金効果は\n もう これ以上 強化できないようだ。\n:
The alchemy effects currently on this piece of
equipment cannot be enhanced any further.
You're lucky!

143564.「この効果を強化するのに 必要な\n <%sL_MAT_ITEM>の数が 足らな:
I'll need more <%sL_MAT_ITEM>s to
enhance this effect. Without those, I sadly
can't help you.

143565.「この錬金効果は もう強化できないぞ。\n これ以上 強化すれば こいつの負担に:
This effect cannot be enhanced any further.
If I did, it'd be too much for you to handle.
So, I can't do it.

143566.「……残念だが お前の持つ 装備品には\n 錬金強化できるものが ひとつもない。:
I'm sorry, but none of your equipment can be
enhanced by alchemy. I'm sorry, but you'll
have to come back.

143567.「錬金石という素材を 持ってくれば\n お前が装備したことのある レベル85以上:
If you bring me a material called alchemy stone, I will enhance the alchemy effect of any piece of equipment you have equipped that
is above level 85. There are several types of alchemy stones, but they must be suitable for your equipment. The equipment has to be
compatible with each other. And even if you want to enhance it, you can't enhance it to the highest value that the alchemist can give
it. There are some items that cannot be enhanced, such as equipment that can still be given the alchemy effect, or effects that can
only be given by Hocus Pocus. Unfortunately, I can't save all equipment either, so please understand that.

143568.「……では いくぞ。\n 錬金石のエネルギーを\n こいつに 注入する。\n<b:
Okay, here we go. Injecting alchemical
energies into this thing. Haaaaaaaaaaaa...
haaaaaaaa!
<se_nots Joutyu_SE 47><end>

143569.「強化成功だ。\n これで こいつも 浮かばれるだろう。\n<end>:
It's a reinforced success. This should keep
him afloat.
<end>

143570.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>に ついていた\n<%sL_REN:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>'s <%sL_RENKIN_BEFORE>
effect has been enhanced to
<%sL_RENKIN_AFTER>!
<se_nots System 7>

143571.<se_nots System 18>まだリリースしません。: <se_nots System 18>We will not release it yet.

143572.「他に 用は あるか？\n<break>: Is there anything else you need?<break>

143573.「錬金効果を 強化するのか？\n<break>:
Want to enhance your alchemy effects?
<break>

143575.「初めて見る顔だな。\n 聞こえるぞ…… お前の持つ\n 装備品たちの 嘆きの声:
I've never seen your face before. I can hear the lamentations of your equipment. I'm sure it must be disappointing to hear them
lamenting that they could fully realize their potential if only a better alchemy effect could be applied to them. But rest assured. I
have developed a technique to enhance the alchemy effect in order to save them. If you bring me a material called alchemy stone, I
will enhance the alchemy effect of any equipment you have equipped that is above level 85. There are several types of alchemy
stones, but they must be suitable for your equipment. The equipment has to be compatible with each other. And even if you want to
enhance it, you can't enhance it to the highest value that the alchemist can give it. There are some items that cannot be enhanced,
such as equipment that can still be given the alchemy effect, or effects that can only be given by Hocus Pocus. I'm sorry, but I can't
save all equipment either, so please understand that. Well...

143635.「この装備の効果 <%sL_RENKIN>は\n 今は <%nL_NOW_STE:
This equipment's <%sL_RENKIN> effect is
currently at level <%dL_NOW_STEP_NUM>. It can be enhanced
up to level <%dL_MAX_STEP_NUM>.

144087.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>の\n どの錬金効果を 強化させ:
Which of the <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>'s
alchemy effects do you want to enhance?
<break>

144088.「どの装備を 強化させたいんだ？\n<break>:
Which piece of equipment do you want to
enhance?<break>

144089.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n ロックされているが\n:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is locked, do you mind
if I enhance it?
<yesno 2><break>

144289.「おいおい まっさらの新品じゃないか。\n こいつはまだ 装備品にすら なりきれ:
Hey, hey, hey. It's brand-new. This thing is
not even fully equipped yet. Before you start
refining it, equip it first.
<bw_break>

144864.「おいおい こいつは まだ\n 錬金効果を つけられるじゃないか。\n<br>\:
Hey, hey, hey, he can still apply the alchemy effect. With my technology, I can only save equipment with the last of the alchemy effect.
I'm sorry, but you'll have to understand that.
